Title: Rebar3: Command Injection
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Rebar3, which can lead to command injection.

Background.Text: A sophisticated build-tool for Erlang projects that follows OTP principles.

Description.Text: Rebar3 is vulnerable to OS command injection via the URL parameter of a dependency specification.

Impact.Text: A vulnerability has been discovered in Rebar3. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: Gentoo has discontinued support for Rebar3 binary package. We recommend that users unmerge it:
